addr: 4959 Santa Monica Boulevard Los Angeles, CA 90029
title: SAUCE! Free Comedy Show & Authentic Italian Pizza!
desc: Every Friday night at 8 pm, join Barbara Gray, Jeff Wattenhofer, Erin Lampart and Eric Dadourian as they host some of the best comedians in the country in one of the best pizza spots in Los Angeles! Come out and have some pizza, drinks, and laughs to get your weekend started! DeSano Pizza Bakery Los Angeles is just west of Santa Monica and Vermont. There's a criminally large and free parking lot, artisan pizzas, gelato, primo comedy, $5 beers, friends, memories... FEATURING: Comedians from Conan, The Late Show, HBO, Comedy Central, FX, IFC, Netflix, you name it, we got 'em! A giant free parking lot! Artisan Pizzas! Gelato! $5 Beers! Friends! Memories! Join us every Friday night at 8 pm!? Desano Pizza - 4959 Santa Monica Blvd $5 Suggested Donation *EARLY ARRIVAL IS SUGGESTED - SHOWROOM DOORS OPEN AT 7:50, SHOW BEGINS AROUND 8:15*
